 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Mid-Year Check-In: Pause. Reflect. Realign.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1213&user=10620> 	

As we step into the second half of the year, now is the perfect time to pause, reflect, and reconnect on your goals.
Your Mid-Year Check-In is an opportunity to reflect on your achievements, identify the support you may need, and refocus your goals to stay aligned with evolving priorities. If you need to adjust your goals, DRIVE will remain open for Goal editing until 31 August.

Let’s continue building a culture where conversations are a catalyst for clarity, connection, and growth.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1213&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-4-min.png>

Let’s continue building a culture where conversations are a catalyst for clarity, connection, and growth.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1213&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-4-min.png> 	

Elisa Bruno Honored by Italian Republic

Elisa Bruno, CEO of Level Shoes, was honored last week with the title of “Knight of Merit <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1214&user=10620> ”, among the highest distinctions awarded to Italian citizens, during the Italian National Day celebrations in Dubai. This recognition honors her leadership at Level Shoes and dedication to Italian culture and is awarded to individuals who have made meaningful contributions in fields such as the arts, economics, and humanitarian efforts. Following a distinguished career with leading Italian and international fashion houses, Elisa Bruno is recognized as one of the most influential leaders of her generation.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1214&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-7-min.png>

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1214&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-7-min.png> 	

A new episode of The Podcast 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/c04468a89de62d49bff46f836625665541730301.gif> 	

In this episode of The Podcast, Lynn Alkhatib, sits down with Tory Burch, the iconic American fashion designer and entrepreneur behind the globally recognised brand that bears her name. Known for blending timeless style with bold purpose, Tory opens up about building her business from the ground up, the challenges she faced as a woman in fashion, and how launching the Tory Burch Foundation became her true calling.
Tune in through: 
Spotify <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1215&user=10620>  | Apple <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1216&user=10620>  | Anghami <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1216&user=10620>  | YouTube <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1217&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-2-min.png> 	

Welcome Nada Salah to the Group

Known for blending timeless style with bold purpose, Tory opens up about building her business from the ground up, the challenges she faced as a woman in fashion, and how launching the Tory Burch Foundation became her true calling.
Tune in through: 
Spotify <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1215&user=10620>  | Apple <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1216&user=10620>  | Anghami <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1216&user=10620>  | YouTube <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1217&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-2-min.png> 	

Welcome Nada Salah to the Group

Nada Salah joins the Group as Senior People Partner for the Planning Team, reporting directly to Sara Hegazi. Her diverse experience and strategic insight position her to add value to the planning team and support Chalhoub Group’s goals and initiatives.
Nada's career began in project management and expanded into HR, with roles in high-impact industries like oil & gas and aerospace. Over the past eight years, she served as a People Project Manager at Unilever, leading complex, full-lifecycle projects and contributing to the HR People Management team. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1218&user=10620>
